label: AB2_hP12_143_ad_bc2d-001
title: Trigonal MoS$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
MoS$_{2}$ exists naturally in two forms: a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hR3_160_a_2a-001}{rhombohedral structure} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hP6_194_c_f-001}{the hexagonal structure, molybdenite, {\em Strukturbericht} $C7$}.  The two structures differ due to the stacking of the MoS$_{2}$ layers. 
 Depending on the preparation method, MoS$_{2}$ can exist in other forms, including this trigonal structure. 
 Space group $P3$ \# 143 allows an arbitrary choice of the origin of the z-axis.  Here we choose z$_{1}$ = 1/2 for the Mo I site.
